  • public class ReadCSVDirection
extends ReadCSV
    The class extends the abstract class 'ReadCSV' for reading the file of saving directions between classrooms.

      • getRealDirection

        public Direction getRealDirection(Vertex sourceV,
                                  Vertex actualV,
                                  Vertex destV,
                                  org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultDirectedWeightedGraph<Vertex,Edge> g)
        Get the real direction between 'source' and 'destination' depending on the actual vertex. THe real direction is the direction that a person should actually take to go from actual vertex to the dest vertex. This direction depend on where he came from. Eg : relative to the actual vertex he came from west(left) and go to east(right) so the real is north(forward)
        Parameters:
        sourceV - : the previous location.
        actualV - : the current location.
        destV - : the next location
        g - : the graph
        Returns:
        the real direction between 'source' and 'destination'.
